updates.text: [NSL]: Train services has resumed. Free regular bus services between #Yishun and #ToaPayoh has ceased.
[NSL] UPDATE: Fault cleared, train svcs are progressively being restored.
[NSL] UPDATE : Due to a track fault, pls add 10mins train travel time btwn #Yishun and #ToaPayoh.
[NSL] UPDATE: Due to a track fault, pls add 15mins train travel time btwn #Yishun and #ToaPayoh. Free regular bus svcs from #Yishun to #ToaPayoh.
[NSL] Due to a track fault, pls add 15mins train travel time btwn #Yishun and #ToaPayoh. Free regular bus svcs from #Yishun to #ToaPayoh. Our station staff will assist.
[NSL]: Due to a track fault, pls add 15mins train travel time btwn #Yishun and #ToaPayoh. Free regular bus svcs from #Yishun to #ToaPayoh. Our station staff will assist.
[NSL]: Due to a track fault, pls add 15mins train travel time btwn #Yishun and #ToaPayoh.
